text: “Kids, don’t you love your teddy bear?”

Teddy bear, teddy bear,
Turn around.

Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear,
Touch the ground.

Teddy bear, teddy bear,
Polish your shoes.

Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear,
Off to school.

Teddy Bear, Teddy bear,
Jump up high.

Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear,
Touch the sky.

Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear,
Bend down low.

Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear,
Touch your toes.

Teddy bear, teddy bear,
Time to sleep.

Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear,
Do not peep.

Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear,
Turn off the light.

Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear,
Say goodnight.
